about_the_game:
The tunes that have accompanied Skinny in his quest to save his friend Ronald now available to download.
An hour of great music inspired by the impertinent attitude and a sparkling wit of the game's protagonist.
Also included the Book of References: a PDF detailing all the nods to videogame and pop culture found in the game.
Did you manage to catch them all?
